title: Bug 50063Latest trunck can't configure context when metadatacomplete is true and version is 3.0
description: patch: Eclipse Workspace Patch 1.0P tomcat7.0.xIndex: java/org/apache/catalina/startup/ContextConfig.java=================================================================== java/org/apache/catalina/startup/ContextConfig.java(revision 1006105)+++ java/org/apache/catalina/startup/ContextConfig.java(working copy)@@ 1281,6 +1281,7 @@}}} else {+webXml.configureContext(context);ok = true;}
